result.eng: Myself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ga: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche Aoine
result.orig: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche Aoine
result.html: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche AoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ponchtml: Téim féin agus mo ḃean ċéile amaċ fá ċoinne béile aċan oíċe AoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.

result.eng: And you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ga: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.orig: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagart
result.html: Agus bíodh a fhios agat go mbíonn toradh i mBaile Átha Cliath fá choinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.
result.ponchtml: Agus bíoḋ a ḟios agat go mbíonn toraḋ i mBaile Áṫa Cliaṫ fá ċoinne na sagartAnd you should know that they look with favour on what priests say in Dublin.

result.eng: The sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ga: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.orig: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibh
result.html: D'éirigh an ghrian agus nocht na caisleáin óir fá ghiota dóibhThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.
result.ponchtml: D'éiriġ an ġrian agus noċt na caisleáin óir fá ġiota dóiḃThe sun rose and the golden castles appeared not far from them.

result.eng: We depend on him for food all year round.
result.ga: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.orig: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia bliana
result.html: Tá muid ina mhuinín fá choinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.
result.ponchtml: Tá muid ina ṁuinín fá ċoinne bia blianaWe depend on him for food all year round.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: He got close enough to him to talk.
result.ga: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.orig: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dó
result.html: Tháinig sé fá fhad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sé fá ḟad cainte dóHe got close enough to him to talk.

result.ga: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.orig: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.html: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
result.ga: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.orig: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.html: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad fá ẛiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.

result.eng: The city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ga: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.orig: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibh
result.html: Bhí an baile mór fá chupla céad míle dóibhThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an baile mór fá ċupla céad míle dóiḃThe city was a couple hundred miles away.
